name: Facepunch Awfully Dark
additional_info:
v25 - changed my retarded glowy username to not be performance intensive
v24 - adding diwako's changes:
-remove -@-moz-document tag, it breaks on everything but on firefox
-fixed ban messages in quotes showing up as spoilers
-fix for FPAndroid post indicators bug
-fix inacio's avatar on fp droid
-ran beautify script over CSS (causing the mass changes spam)
v23 - whoposted now works properly
v22b - now with win8/8.1 icons too
v22a - very minor changes to the browser/os icons, they're a bit flatter and more recent now, thanks to diwako
v22 - new post time/date icon
v21 - search results are now also styled
v20c - fixes dropdown lists and stuff having wrong username colors
v20b - fixed Who's Reading names not being styled properly
v20a - fixes mod names also becoming white
v20 - now compatible with the new blue usernames
v19 - fixes some popups (Insert Image, Insert Video, Smiley) that weren't dark. now they are!
v18 - ticker was broken, now it isn't
v17 - added a urine yellow-ish line next to your posts. had to hack your computer to do this sorry
v16b - tiny tweaks on how frontpage works, thanks profilica
v16 - the color for gold members is now less brown, more gold
v15 - more fixes! text fields, notifications, oh my
v14 - bunch of changes and fixes, too lazy
v13 - Read threads on the ticker are fixed! Thanks, diwako!
v12 - PM and visitor msg notifications are black now, also avatars on the front page are no longer rounded and dumb
v11d - tweaked online status indicator
v11c - hotfix
v11b - tweaked/changed read, stickied, locked and deleted threads
v11 - read and stickied threads reworked, now much nicer
v10 - changed color of spoiler tags: now gray
v9 - read threads will have darker titles
v8 - editor should be fixed, search too. default text a bit brighter (#ccc from #aaa)
v7 - brighter ticker
v6 - new subforum threadpage picker, subforum page picker, thread last post username, viewcount
v5 - new logo works on firefox
v4 - new thread title field fix
v3 - [t] fixed
v2 - ticker, font, more
v1 - release
